articles.author: Sydney Lake
articles.title: Homebuyers are being haunted like Scrooge this holiday season as Fortune 500 chief economist sees ‘housing market of Christmas past’ settling in for 2024 - Fortune
articles.description: Housing market of today mimics that of the 1980s, First American chief economist Mark Fleming says
articles.content: The old adage that history repeats itself can be just as worrisome as it is comforting. But in a time of stress, like a housing crisis, recession or other economic downturn,  its human nature to stri… [+6845 chars]
